works.description:
The article at the infringing blog has  
copied whole of my client's article starting from ""1) Wait Until the last
 
counselling of any exam you have given. Do not loose hope earlier. 2) You 

should apply in other states too. Actually state like Uttrakhand, Haryana,
 
Uttar pradesh do their own counselling after the end of national  
counselling or in between national counselling. So if you are not getting
a  
NIT of your choice then at least you can get one of state's top
engineering  
college. (This one is one of the most important thing) for example in the 

territory of Uttrakhand there are three government colleges equivalent to 

NITs and a many private engineering colleges. 3) If in worst case scenario
 
you have ranks even lower to get into these colleges you can still have a 

chance to get in. All these colleges have seats reserved for management  
quota so try to get through this processes. You can easily get back what  

you will pay from colleges like these....." and till the end
